mapper.sql: id, PlantsId, PlantsSeason, HumidityUp, HumidityDown, TemperatureUp, TemperatureDown, StartDate, EndDate, CreateTime, CreateUser, ModifyTime, ModifyUser
mapper.select:
select
from PlantsExp where PlantsId = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by StartDate desc
mapper.insert:
insert into PlantsExp ( PlantsId, PlantsSeason, HumidityUp, HumidityDown, TemperatureUp, TemperatureDown, StartDate, EndDate, CreateTime, CreateUser, ModifyTime, ModifyUser) values
(#{item.plantsid}, #{item.plantsseason}, #{item.humidityup}, #{item.humiditydown}, #{item.temperatureup }, #{item.temperaturedown }, #{item.startdate }, #{item.enddate }, #{item.createtime }, #{item.createuser }, #{item.modifytime }, #{item.modifyuser })

mapper.update:
update PlantsExp
PlantsId = #{plantsid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PlantsSeason = #{plantsseason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HumidityUp = #{humidityup,jdbcType=REAL},
HumidityDown = #{humiditydown,jdbcType=REAL},
TemperatureUp = #{temperatureup,jdbcType=REAL},
TemperatureDown = #{temperaturedown,jdbcType=REAL},
StartDate = #{startdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EndDate = #{enddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CreateUser = #{createuser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ModifyUser = #{modifyuser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update PlantsExp set PlantsId = #{plantsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PlantsSeason = #{plantsseason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HumidityUp = #{humidityup,jdbcType=REAL}, HumidityDown = #{humiditydown,jdbcType=REAL}, TemperatureUp = #{temperatureup,jdbcType=REAL}, TemperatureDown = #{temperaturedown,jdbcType=REAL}, StartDate = #{startdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EndDate = #{enddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CreateUser = #{createuser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ModifyUser = #{modifyuser,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
